thread.title: Obese man killed toddler by STANDING on her "in frustration" after tripping over her as she played on floor - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: Obese man killed toddler by STANDING on her "in frustration" after tripping over her as she played on floor - Mirror Online

author: Sophie Evans
title: Obese man killed toddler by STANDING on her "in frustration" after tripping over her as she played on floor - Mirror Online
text:
News Obese man killed toddler by STANDING on her "in frustration" after tripping over her as she played on floor The 15st man callously lied to the three-year-old girl's mum after standing on her stomach "in frustration", a court heard Share The man pleaded guilty to child homicide at the Victorian Supreme Court (Photo: Google) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
An obese man has admitted to killing a three-year-old girl by standing on her. 
The 22-year-old, who weighs 15st 7lbs, stood on the toddler's stomach "in frustration" after tripping over her as she played on the floor. 
He put his entire weight on her, causing her liver to rupture and bleeding in her kidneys, before callously lying to her mum, a court heard. 
The youngster, whose name is being withheld, passed away from her injuries following the horrific incident in Australia two years ago. The 22-year-old, who weighs 15st 7lbs, stood on the toddler "in frustration", the court heard (file picture) (Photo: Rex) Read More Barnet murder: Young man killed after reports of number of men fighting in residential street 
Yesterday, the Victorian Supreme Court heard how the man had been frustrated after tripping over the little girl, who was playing on the floor. 
He stood on her stomach, leaving her with blunt force trauma to the abdomen, senior crown prosecutor Kerri Judd QC told the court. 
An autopsy found the tot also sustained a ruptured liver and bleeding in both kidneys, according to the Sydney Daily Telegraph . 
The man, whose name is also being suppressed, eventually pleaded guilty to child homicide over the incident in 2015. 
He is now awaiting sentencing. Like us on Facebook
